comment.text: The "DeveloperToolsAccess" translation key is used to display the title and description of a section in the Portal Settings application. This text appears as a category title and brief description within a settings page, providing context about developer tools access.

usage.context:
<TrustedMailSection {...settingsBeforeInvitationSettingsProps} />
 <StyledSettingsSeparator />
 
 <Text fontSize="16px" fontWeight="700">
 {t("DeveloperToolsAccess")}
 </Text>
 <div className="category-item-description">
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 {t("DeveloperToolsAccessDescription", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),

{
 id: "portal-settings_catalog-access-dev-tools",
 key: "1-0-3",
 icon: "",
 link: "access-dev-tools",
 tKey: "DeveloperToolsAccess",
 },
 {
 id: "portal-settings_catalog-ip-security",
 key: "1-0-4",
 icon: "",

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'وصول محدود إلى أدوات المطورين' (Limited access to developer tools) doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. It emphasizes access restriction rather than the section itself. A more accurate translation might focus on the 'section' aspect.

The translation "Məhdud Tərtibatçı alətlərinə giriş" is too literal and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Developer Tools section." "Məhdud" means "limited" and isn't appropriate here. It implies restricted access, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like "Proqram Tərtibatçı Alətləri bölməsi" or "Tərtibatçı Alətləri hissəsi" to more accurately reflect the English phrase.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ограничен достъп до Програмни инструменти" translates to "Restricted access to Programming Tools". While not entirely wrong, it doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of "Developer Tools section". It implies a restriction rather than a section within a settings menu. "Developer Tools section" refers to a UI element.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Раздел 'Инструменти за разработчици' or 'Секция 'Инструменти за разработчици'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation "Omezený přístup k nástrojům pro vývojáře" translates to "Restricted access to developer tools." While technically correct, it doesn't match the original English "Developer Tools section". It implies a restriction that might not be the intended meaning. A more accurate translation would better reflect the original meaning of 'section'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možné návrhy: "Sekce nástrojů pro vývojáře", "Nástroje pro vývojáře"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Eingeschränkter Zugriff auf Entwicklertools' (Restricted access to developer tools) doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. It implies access is limited, whereas the English refers to the section itself, not necessarily access.

The translation "Περιορισμένη πρόσβαση στα εργαλεία προγραμματιστών" translates to "Restricted access to developer tools."  While related, it doesn't accurately reflect the English phrase "Developer Tools section". A more accurate translation would convey the idea of a specific *section* or *area*.

The translation "Rajatut kehittäjän työkalut-oikeudet" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Developer Tools section." "Rajatut" implies restricted or limited, which isn't the primary meaning. It's a section, not a set of permissions.
While not strictly incorrect, the hyphenated phrasing 'työkalut-osio' could be improved for readability.

The translation "Accès limité aux outils de développement" doesn't accurately reflect the English "Developer Tools section". It implies restricted access, whereas the original simply refers to the section itself.  A more accurate translation would convey the concept of a section or area.

The translation "Ծրագրավորողի գործիքների սահմանափակ հասանելիություն" (Tseragravorogi gorznikneri sahamanapak hasaneliut'yun) literally translates to "Limited access to developer tools". The English phrase "Developer Tools section" refers to a specific area or part of a larger system. The Armenian translation implies a restriction on access, which isn't the intended meaning. A more accurate translation would focus on the 'section' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like "Ծրագրավորողի գործիքների բաժին" (Tseragravorogi gorznikneri bazin) which translates to "Developer Tools Section" or "Developer Tools Area".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation "Accesso limitato agli strumenti per sviluppatori" doesn't directly translate "Developer Tools section". It translates to something like "Restricted access to developer tools." While conveying a similar concept, it's not a direct translation of the English phrase. A more accurate translation, preserving the 'section' aspect, could be something like "Sezione strumenti per sviluppatori".

The translation '制限された開発者ツールへのアクセス' (Restrictions on access to developer tools) is too literal and doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. It suggests restricted access rather than simply referring to the section itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 開発者ツールセクション (Kaihatsusha Tsūru Sekushon) - a more direct translation using katakana for 'section'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation "제한된 개발자 도구 액세스" translates to "Restricted Developer Tools Access". While related, it doesn't accurately reflect the English "Developer Tools section". It implies restriction, which may not be the intended meaning. "Developer Tools section" simply refers to a specific area or part of a larger application or system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation more closely aligned with 'Developer Tools section', such as "개발자 도구 섹션" (Gae-bal-ja Do-gu Sek-seon) or "개발자 도구 부분" (Gae-bal-ja Do-gu Bubun).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ເຄື່ອງມືຂອງນັກພັດທະນາ" (keun mue khong nak phat tha na) translates to 'tools of the developer,' which is not the same as 'Developer Tools section'. It misses the 'section' part and slightly changes the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອຸປະກອນການພັດທະນາ (upakon kan phat tha na) - This is a more literal and acceptable translation, closer in meaning to "Developer Tools".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ierobežota piekļuve Izstrādātāja rīkiem' (Restricted access to Developer Tools) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. It implies restricted access, while the original refers to a section *containing* developer tools.

The Polish translation 'Ograniczony dostęp do narzędzi dla programistów' translates to 'Restricted access to developer tools'. While not entirely wrong, it doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. It implies restriction rather than simply referring to the section itself.

The translation 'Acesso Limitado às Ferramentas do Programador' is too literal and doesn't convey the same meaning as 'Developer Tools section'. It implies restricted access, which may not be the intended meaning. A more accurate translation should focus on the 'Developer Tools' functionality.

The translation "Acesso limitado às ferramentas do desenvolvedor" (Limited access to developer tools) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Developer Tools section." It implies restriction rather than just referring to the section itself. A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of "Seção de Ferramentas do Desenvolvedor" or "Ferramentas do Desenvolvedor".

The translation 'Acces limitat la Instrumente pentru dezvoltatori' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Developer Tools section'. 'Acces limitat' implies restricted access, whereas the English phrase refers to a specific section within settings. A more accurate translation would be closer to 'Secțiunea Instrumente pentru dezvoltatori' or 'Secțiune Instrumente pentru dezvoltatori'.

The translation 'Ограниченный доступ к инструментам разработчика' (Limited access to developer tools) doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. It implies a restricted access, whereas the original refers to the section itself.

The Slovak translation "Obmedzený prístup k nástrojom pre vývojárov" translates to "Restricted access to developer tools". While not entirely wrong, it's more restrictive than the English "Developer Tools section", which implies a section within a larger application or system.  It doesn't convey the sense of a *section*.

The translation "Omejen dostop do orodij za razvijalce" (Restricted access to developer tools) is too literal and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Developer Tools section". It implies a restriction, whereas the English refers to a section within settings.

The Serbian translation "Ограничен приступ алаткама за програмере" translates to "Restricted access to developer tools." While not entirely wrong, it implies a restriction is in place, whereas the English "Developer Tools section" simply refers to the location of the tools. It's not a restriction, but a label for a section.
The translation uses a colon, which isn't present in the English. It is important that the translation maintains the formatting of the original.

The Serbian translation "Ograničen pristup alatkama za programere" translates to "Restricted access to developer tools." While conveying a similar concept, it doesn't accurately reflect the English "Developer Tools section."  It implies a restriction, which isn't necessarily the meaning of the English phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Alternativni prevodi koji bi bolje odgovarali originalnom značenju uključuju: "Odsek za alate za programere", "Sekcija za alate za programere", ili "Alati za programere - odeljak/sekcija".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation 'Sınırlı Geliştirici Araçları erişimi' translates to 'Limited Developer Tools access'. The English content 'Developer Tools section' implies a location or area, not necessarily a limitation.  'Geliştirici Araçları bölümü' would be a more accurate translation of 'Developer Tools section'.

The translation 'Обмежений доступ до інструментів розробника' (Restricted access to developer tools) doesn't accurately reflect the English phrase 'Developer Tools section'. It implies restricted access, whereas the English phrase simply refers to the location of a section.

The translation "Quyền truy cập công cụ dành cho Nnhà Phát Triển có giới hạn" is not an accurate translation of "Developer Tools section". It translates to "Limited access for Developers' tools". It introduces the concept of 'limited access' which isn't present in the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be "Phần Công cụ dành cho nhà phát triển" or "Phần Công cụ phát triển".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese text contains a typo. The word "Nnhà" should be "Nhà".

The translation "受限的开发者工具访问" (Shòu xiàn de kāi fā zhě gōng jù fǎng wèn) translates to 'Restricted Developer Tools Access.' The English phrase 'Developer Tools section' refers to a specific part of a software application, not necessarily limited access. The current translation implies a restriction that isn't inherently conveyed by the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 开发者工具区域 (Kāi fā zhě gōng jù qū yù) - 'Developer Tools area/section'
